column2: the landing party has collected enough data about this planet. It has a breathable atmosphere
column4: and suitable climate. It's completely colonizable. But it would be nice if someone brought back some samples of the local fauna and resources.;

column2: it would. Let them bring back a couple of local animals and look for some deposits.;-1
I think it's enough. Let the colonists handle the rest
column3: they'll have more time and resources for that.;-1
